title: Getting Started
text: line parameter x_point controls wheather points connected, can used like geom_point + geom_line ggplot2.
code: iris |>    x_chart() |>    x_point(x = "Sepal.Width", y = "Sepal.Length", fill = "Species", size = 1.5) |>    x_options(title = "scatterplot", palette = c("#f7feae", "#46aea0", "#045275")) data.frame(x = 1:10, y = rnorm(10)) |>    x_chart() |>    x_point(x = "x", y = "y", line = TRUE) |>    x_options(legend = FALSE)

title: Getting Started
code: data.frame(   character = c("Ross", "Rachel", "Joey", "Phoebe", "Monica", "Chanlder"),   relationships = c(16, 14, 17, 16, 13, 9) ) |>    x_chart(title = "# of relationships in Friends") |>   x_bar(x = "character", y = "relationships") |>    x_options(legend = FALSE) t <- as.data.frame(Titanic) t <- t[rep(1:nrow(t), t$Freq), c("Class", "Survived")]  t |>    count(Class, Survived) |>    x_chart(title = "Titanic survivors by class and age") |>    x_bar(x = "Class", y = "n", fill = "Survived") |>    x_options(ylabel = "")

title: Common configuration options — xkcd-option
code: x_options(   w,   title = NULL,   xlabel = NULL,   ylabel = NULL,   palette = NULL,   font_family = "xkcd",   stroke = "black",   background = "white",   legend = TRUE,   legend_position = 1,   time_format = NULL,   x_breaks = 3,   y_breaks = 3,   ... )  x_label(w, title = NULL, xlabel = NULL, ylabel = NULL)  x_title(w, title = NULL)  x_legend(w, legend = TRUE, legend_position = 1)

title: Common configuration options — xkcd-option
text: w: xkcd widget object title: title xlabel: title x axis ylabel: title y axis palette: color palette different groups font_family: font family stroke: color axis, title legend box background: background color legend: legend shown legend_position: integer controlling legend position, 1 (left), 2 (right), 3 (left), 4 (right) time_format: time format use x values time, chart.xkcd use dayjs format time,  find available formats https://github.com/iamkun/dayjs/blob/dev/docs/en/API-reference.md#list---available-formats

title: Shiny bindings for xkcd — xkcd-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates xkcd env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.
